1. "The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo" (2008) directed by David Fincher. This film is based on the popular novel of the same name written by Stieg Larsson. The film stars Daniel Craig as journalist Mikael Blomkvist, and Rooney Mara as his associate Lisbeth Salander. The film is a thrilling tale of murder, revenge, and betrayal set in Stockholm, Sweden.

2. "The Machinist" (2010) directed by David Fincher again. This film follows the story of William H. Sadler (Benicio Del Toro), who is working as a machinist. As he works late into the night, he begins to see strange and mysterious occurrences around him. These occurrences seem to be related in some way to his work as a machinist. As the strange and mysterious occurrences continue to occur around him, he begins to experience strange and mysterious sensations within himself. These sensations seem to be related in some way to his work as a machinist. Based on their message, it seems like the user is interested in a thriller movie. Here are some recommendations based on this genre:

- Se7en (1995) - Directed by David Fincher and starring Kevin Spacey as serial killer Jack Grimes.

- Gone Girl (2014) - Directed by Ben Affleck and starring Rosamund Pike as the missing wife, Amy Dunne.

- Shutter Island (2010) - Directed by Martin Scorsese and starring Leonardo DiCaprio as an FBI agent investigating a disturbed inmate on an isolated island.

- Prisoners (2013) - Directed by Paul Thomas Anderson and starring Riz Ahmed, Jason Momoa, and Emma Stone as two prisoners who must escape from prison in order to uncover the truth about their imprisonment.

- The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2014) - Directed by David Fincher and starring Rooney Mara as Lisbeth Salander, a brilliant private investigator, and Daniel Craig as Martin Arden, a wealthy businessman and one of Salander’s prime suspects.
